mapper.insert: insert into t_dom_owner_res(domid, ownerid, restypeid,status) values (#{domId}, #{ownerId}, #{resTypeId},1);
mapper.select: SELECT restypeid FROM t_dom_owner_res WHERE t_dom_owner_res.domid=#{domId} AND t_dom_owner_res.ownerid=#{ownerId};
SELECT restypeid FROM t_dom_res_type WHERE t_dom_res_type.domid=#{domId} ;

select
from t_dom_res_type where domid = #{domid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_dom_res_type (restypeid, domid, restypedes, pid,resname,status) values (#{resTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{domId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resTypeDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{resName,jdbcType=CHAR},#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},)

insert into t_dom_res_type
restypeid,
domid,
restypedes,
pid,
resname,
status,
#{resTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{domId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{resTypeDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{resName,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_dom_res_type
domid = #{domId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
restypedes = #{resTypeDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{resName,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where restypeid = #{resTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
